1.content:
Welcome to the planet Bergeron, a humanimal world except for one exception. The government is human and they rule with an iron fist and they'll resort to do anything to keep it that way especially, manipulating the media to their selfish ends, enter the Hacker Squad. A group of humanimals that are computer geniouses. Their goal, liberate the planet from The Government. Please choose in the following.

Name:

Avatar:

Species:

Gender:

Age:

Looks:

Background:

Favorite food:
1.title: Welcome to the squad

11.content:
Name: Victor Buffalo

Avatar: Buffalord

Species: Buffalo

Gender: Male

Age: 22

Looks: Brown curley hair with brown fur, he normally wears a green polo shirt and black jeans.

Background: He used to work for a law firm as a finance manager, but thanks to computer fraud he was framed for embezzling funds for the company, now he wants to clear himself of those charges by finding and expose the one who framed him.

Favorite food: Pizza, Salad, Mountain Dew
11.title: Buffalord

choices: A human, male, african-american and blind
A human woman accompanying a giraff humanimal
111.content: Victor's alarm goes off about 7:30, Victor wakes up and heads outside to get the paper. He never bothered to look at the want adds because no one wants to hire him after that embezzlment scam. Victor sighs and thinks "How am I supposed to earn money so I can pay my bills? Whoever did this to me really screwed me over." Then the phone rang, Victor answers "Uh, Hello?" "Mr. Victor Buffalo?" the voice says, Victor says "Yes, this is Victor, who is this?" said Victor. The voice says "Who I am is unimportant. It's what I can do for you that's important." Victor says "Okay, what can you do to me?" The voice says "I'll tell you personally, meet me at Matoaka square at 10:30," Victor says "Okay, how will I recognize you?" The voice says "I'll be wearing a red cap." Then he hung up. Victor had his breakfast, and did his normal morning routines as he got to Matoaka square he sees.
111.title: Buffalord's story

1112.content:
Victor saw a Giraffe girl coming he bowed and kissed her hand

"I'm honored to meet you Madame Giraffe." He said

Her Mother said "All right time to get down to business!"
1112.title: A giraff girl

12.content:
Name: Eve Hoof

Avatar: Paprika

Gender: Female

Species: Giraffe

Age: 18

Looks: Tall, and graceful like a Giraffe should be, long brown hair that cascades down her neck, brown eyes, normally wears a plain white dress.

Background: A Giraffe Humanimal raised by caring Human foster parents, Eve is unusally privlaged and seeks to help others because of it.

Favorite Foods: Lemon Sorbet, Sangria, and Sugar Cubes (Hertz...An Buffalo that eats meat? Um...Gross)
12.title: Paprika

121.content:
Eve woke up to the sounds of birds chirping outside her window, her ears flickered a bit then her Hu7masn foster Mother came into the room.

Eve walked outside she yawned, her plain white nightgown that fell to her ankles swirled about her.

As she sat down with her foster family, she said "Mom, Dad...Today is the day I become 18..."

"Yes..." Her Mom said

"And you said the day I turned 18 you would finally tell me the story of how I came to be adopted...Well I'm 18 now."

The Parents looked at each other and sighed
121.title: Another Day

1211.content:
They told the story that her parents died when she was a small child, how they died I'm not going to go into because it is so gruesome. Let's just say Eve was quite shocked when she heard the tale

"Oh god!" She cried "Oh God!"

"Yes..." Her Mom said "It is a terrible story...But we can do something about it."

Her Mom got up "Get dressed quickly Eve, we have a meeting to attend to."

They met at Matoaka Square
1211.title: You Don't Want to Know

12111.content:
They met a Buffalo Man, when he saw Eve coming he bowed and kissed her hand

"I'm honored to meet you Madame Giraffe." He said

Eve's Mom said "All right time to get down to business!"
12111.title: A Buffalo Man

121111.content:
After telling her his sad tale of woe...Victor the Buffalo told Eve

"We need your help...We need to gather as many hackers as possible."

"How many do we need?" Eve asked

"Quite a few." Victor replied "I got a contact from someone calling themselves...Genesis all I know is that Genesis is a Jaguar Humanimal...We are to meet them on the Island of Saint Francis."

"How are we going to get there?" Eve asked

"We get there by..."
121111.title: The Journey

13.content:
Name: Mania Black

Avatar: Genesis

Species: Jaguar

Gender: Female

Age: 23

Looks: Mania stands at five feet and is a small individual. She has long flowing black hair and small almond shaped eyes that are bright blue. Her skin is tanned and her build is athletic.

Background: Mania grew up with foster parents as an only child. While she was spoiled, she also learned independence and moved out when she was 18. She still has a good relationship with her parents and works as an administrative assistant at her mother's law firm. Besides being a humanimal, Mania has lived a life of normalcy that has bored her until her admittance to the force.

Favorite Food: Lemon Sorbet
13.title: Genesis

info.brief_description: A can you liberate a futuristic planet from a corrupt government?
info.description: In honor for the upcoming Nextgen title, Watch Dogs, You play one of each character fighting a government that rules the planet by force and manipulate the media to their selfish ends. Now you must find a way to reveal the truth.
